data.text: @kiley_holliday @hamill_law @GavinNewsom @lapublichealth Hopefully ppl will remember all the dumb mandates based on “science” that caused more harm than anything else come November and get them all out
@trekkerteach12 @hamill_law @GavinNewsom @lapublichealth That’s insane that ppl would actually want that madness to continue
@hamill_law @GavinNewsom @lapublichealth Don’t worry, we’ll remember come November

@anelacistine @myrabatchelder @hamill_law @GavinNewsom @lapublichealth No!  What did all the “immunocompromised” people do before 2020?  YOU wear an N95 and stay home, you’re the one with the problem, not us! 🤡😂

@lerual8675309 @myrabatchelder @hamill_law @GavinNewsom @lapublichealth Your right to swing your fists end at the next persons face.  What right do you have to spread deadly germs?  Stay home or wear an N95.

@justloo08927540 @myrabatchelder @hamill_law @GavinNewsom @lapublichealth Yes, 100%.  No one has the right to spread germs.  If you're sick you have an moral obligation to stay home and minimize the harm you do.
